name: Pawn Shop
description: A shop where people can pawn or buy second-hand items; adventurers can find hidden treasures among the cast-offs, purchase affordable gear, or discover the stories behind unusual objects.
atmosphere: The shop is filled with the musty scent of second-hand goods and the sound of haggling over the value of items. The air carries the promise of hidden treasures and the essential nature of second chances, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of opportunity and the stories behind each object's history.
